alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:53PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Mitchell County through 730 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pelham, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pelham, Camilla and Cotton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
